dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: A pioneer dataset for visual recognition systems in robotic applications, capturing data from a VW station wagon equipped with multiple cameras and a laser scanner, providing 3D bounding box annotations.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: Vitor Campanholo Guizilini
Rares Ambrus
Sudeep Pillai
Adrien Gaidon
dcterms:description: A dataset used for self-supervised monocular depth estimation, providing a large-scale collection of images for training depth estimation models.
dcterms:title: DDAD15M

dcterms:creator: Yan Wang
Binh Yang
Rui Hu
Ming Liang
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for efficient 3D object detection from stereo images, providing stereo image pairs with annotations for training detection models.
dcterms:title: PLUMENet

dcterms:creator: Zhuoling Li
Z. Qu
Yang Zhou
Jianzhuang Liu
Haoqian Wang
Lihui Jiang
dcterms:description: A dataset that emphasizes the importance of diversity in depth clues for reliable monocular 3D object detection, providing various depth annotations.
dcterms:title: MonoDDE

dcterms:creator: Dennis Park
Rares Ambrus
Vitor Campanholo Guizilini
Jie Li
Adrien Gaidon
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the necessity of pseudo-LiDAR for monocular 3D object detection, providing images and depth information for training.
dcterms:title: DD3D

dcterms:creator: Thomas Roddick
Alex Kendall
Roberto Cipolla
dcterms:description: A dataset that introduces orthographic feature transform for monocular 3D object detection, providing images and annotations for training.
dcterms:title: OFT

dcterms:creator: Cody Reading
Ali Harakeh
Julia Chae
Steven L Waslander
dcterms:description: A dataset that predicts categorical depth distributions for monocular 3D object detection, providing images and depth annotations.
dcterms:title: CaDDN
